name: Power Stomper
description:
So this is my submission for my first Ludum Dare. The theme was "life is currency" (which is a really bad theme btw), so I decided to make a game where you would trade your life for power. I tried to go with a Mario-style-stomping-baddies kinda gameplay.

I didn't have nearly as much time as I wanted to to make this due to business, doing the majority of it in the last twelve hours of the event. However I think it still turned out decently well and I've learned, so it's a win in my book. :)

Ctrl + R to reset game.

Keyboard controls:

WASD to move

Space to jump

Enter to start

Xbox controls:

Control stick to move

A to jump

menu to start
